answers.answer: I've never thought it was that bad!! It tastes like an extra sweet sunkist...its not the most delicious drink ever, but doable!! ;-) ask for it cold tho!! I've also heard they make a fruitpunch one now? I've only had orange! ;-)

I've always had lemon-lime, it tastes kind of like flat sprite.  not great but not horrible.  I always have to be sure to eat protein like eggs after the test to counteract the sugar though, or I feel off all day.

question: Getting ready to take the GTT Diabetes test on Monday. I can only hope that sugary goop everyone is talking about isnt that bad. I also hope that I dont have gestational diabetes. Praying for great results.
title: The Diabetes GTT test on Monday
